description: This file is a test specification for the AppComponent in an Angular application. It sets up a testing module with necessary imports and defines a test case to verify the component creation.

classes.name: AppComponent
classes.description: The main component of the Angular application being tested.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up the testing environment before each test case runs, configuring the testing module with necessary imports.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines a test case to verify that the application component can be instantiated successfully.
